info.title: EventManager API and Documentation
info.description:
### EventManager API Documentation.
EventManager API can be used to programatically create and manage event centers. You will be able to:
- Create Account as a user and center owner.
- Create an Event Center.
- Update an Event Center.
- Get the events booked for a center.
- Set the availability of a center.
- Decline an event
- Create an event.
- Update an event.
- Cancel an event.
- Get bookings information.

422.description: No token provided for this operation.

phoneNumber: Phone number has already been used.

matchPassword: Match password is not the same as Password

parameters.name: admin
parameters.description: Set to true to fetch admin centers. NB: Token must be provided.

centers.name: Havilla Center
centers.details: The best place you can have your event.

expectedResponse.body: {"centers":[{"id":7,"name":"Havilla Center","address":"11 Oguntade street","area":"Iju","state":1,"capacity":3000,"type":1,"ownerId":1,"contactId":3,"facilities":"Chairs,Cameras,Security","amount":7000000,"details":"The best place you can have your event.","image":"http://res.cloudinary.com/omokolataiwo/image/upload/v1526488178/txhdrd6bct4krpkegqzj.jpg","approve":1,"active":1,"createdAt":"2018-05-16T16:29:40.05Z","updatedAt":"2018-05-16T16:35:40.562Z"},{"id":6,"name":"Knightbridge Hotels Big Hall","address":"171, Oworonsoki Oshodi Expressway,","area":"Gbagada","state":25,"capacity":3000,"type":2,"ownerId":2,"contactId":2,"facilities":"Chairs,Dance Floor,Air Conditioner,Changing Room,Banquet Style,Internet,Security Cameras,Lighting,Parking Space,Sound System,Stage,Tables,Projector,White Board,Rest Room,Security","amount":65000,"details":"Classy is just a tip of the iceberg with Sheba Centre. A Grand marquee setting aimed at pleasing you and granting all your wishes on that special day. Classy chandeliers to add glam to your day. It is located in a serene environment that is accessible from every part of Lagos. State of the art changing room and classy rest room after devouring the owambe delicacies await you. It seats comfortably 800 persons in banquet setting. A very spacious compound for flawless parking of cars is available for your guest. Tables, chairs, well-structured stage, 24 hour power supply, lighting, air condition, well-structured stage and maximum security is guaranteed.","image":"http://res.cloudinary.com/omokolataiwo/image/upload/v1524637266/Trendy2_edbqto.jpg","approve":1,"active":1,"createdAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z","updatedAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z"},{"id":5,"name":"Sheba Centre","address":"28, Ayodele Okeowo Street, Soluyi","area":"Ajah","state":25,"capacity":3000,"type":1,"ownerId":1,"contactId":1,"facilities":"Chairs,Dance Floor,Air Conditioner,Changing Room,Banquet Style,Internet,Security Cameras,Lighting,Parking Space,Sound System,Stage,Tables,Projector,White Board,Rest Room,Security","amount":65000,"details":"Add a unique touch to your event at Tobol Event Centre. Have a grand event at our exquisite marquee. Be classy on your memorable day with state of the art decoration. It seats 500 persons in a banquet setting and 650 in a theatre setting. Facilities such as tables, chairs, rest rooms, changing room, air condition, 24 hour power supply, fans and reliable security are available just for you.","image":"http://res.cloudinary.com/omokolataiwo/image/upload/v1524637267/1EJsG8mML7zCBdC1KN8E_ll2egj.jpg","approve":1,"active":1,"createdAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z","updatedAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z"},{"id":4,"name":"Tobol Event Centre","address":"17 Billing way, Oregun","area":"Ikeja","state":25,"capacity":3000,"type":2,"ownerId":2,"contactId":2,"facilities":"Chairs, Lighting, Parking Space, Sound System, Stage, Tables, Projector, White Board","amount":65000,"details":"FM EVENT Centre is a perfect venue for you, whether for a wedding, Christmas party, product launch, meetings, conferences or entertainment events. Together with our experienced events managers and award winning hospitality, we ensure that your experience with us is extraordinary and truly memorable.","image":"http://res.cloudinary.com/omokolataiwo/image/upload/v1524637267/opique-event-center-28540i1lTOVEbXw5K4i4ntjD_1038_600_wbr2eg.jpg","approve":1,"active":1,"createdAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z","updatedAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z"},{"id":3,"name":"FM EVENT Centre","address":"Ijaiye-Isheri Road, Aguda-Ogba","area":"Lekki","state":25,"capacity":3000,"type":1,"ownerId":1,"contactId":1,"facilities":"Chairs,Dance Floor,Air Conditioner,Changing Room,Banquet Style,Internet,Security Cameras,Lighting,Parking Space,Sound System,Stage,Tables,Projector,White Board,Rest Room,Security","amount":65000,"details":"Sapphire Hall is located on the first floor of the building with full AC and in a serene and secure environment. Sapphire hall is suitable for all kinds of events with a capacity of 150 guest.","image":"http://res.cloudinary.com/omokolataiwo/image/upload/v1524637268/WebSize_Sweetgrass20_fvb4ov.jpg","approve":1,"active":1,"createdAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z","updatedAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z"},{"id":2,"name":"Platinum Hall","address":"9/11, Kudirat Abiola Way, Oregun Bus-stop","area":"Ikeja","state":25,"capacity":2000,"type":2,"ownerId":2,"contactId":2,"facilities":"Chairs,Dance Floor,Air Conditioner,Changing Room,Banquet Style,Internet,Security Cameras,Lighting,Parking Space,Sound System,Stage,Tables,Projector,White Board,Rest Room,Security","amount":70000,"details":"Platinum Hall is Marquee tent located on a spacious landmass within the premises in a serene and secured environment of Ikeja with full AC. Our hall is suitable for all kinds of events with a capacity of 400 guests.","image":"http://res.cloudinary.com/omokolataiwo/image/upload/v1524637268/20160601_154458-min_iod3wp.jpg","approve":1,"active":1,"createdAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z","updatedAt":"2018-12-12T00:00:00Z"}],"count":7}

center.name: Classique Events Place Pearl Hall
center.address: MKO Abiola Gardens, Opposite NNPC Gas Plant, Alausa,
center.facilities: Chairs,Dance Floor,Air Conditioner,Changing Room,Banquet Style,Internet,Security Cameras,Lighting,Parking Space,Sound System,Stage,Tables,Projector,White Board,Rest Room,Security
center.details: It gives us great pleasure to introduce, Classique Events Place Pearl Hall. A one and a half acre piece of property, uniquely brick built with the state of the art facility within a well kept vicinity. It is spacious, fully airconditioned and highly insulated with capacity to host up to 500 guests in banquet settings and 1000 guests in theater settings. This makes it convenient for us to host both corporate and retail events in a serene environment. They can conveniently host weddings, corporate functions, parties, banquets, church services and more It further has the capacity to accommodate over 300 cars parked within the premises without obstructing free flow of traffic along the high way.

id: Id must be a valid number

centers.details: The best place you can have your event.

centers.name: Knightbridge Hotels Big Hall
centers.facilities: Chairs,Dance Floor,Air Conditioner,Changing Room,Banquet Style,Internet,Security Cameras,Lighting,Parking Space,Sound System,Stage,Tables,Projector,White Board,Rest Room,Security
centers.details: Classy is just a tip of the iceberg with Sheba Centre. A Grand marquee setting aimed at pleasing you and granting all your wishes on that special day. Classy chandeliers to add glam to your day. It is located in a serene environment that is accessible from every part of Lagos. State of the art changing room and classy rest room after devouring the owambe delicacies await you. It seats comfortably 800 persons in banquet setting. A very spacious compound for flawless parking of cars is available for your guest. Tables, chairs, well-structured stage, 24 hour power supply, lighting, air condition, well-structured stage and maximum security is guaranteed.

It seats 500 persons in a banquet setting and 650 in a theatre setting. Facilities such as tables, chairs, rest rooms, changing room, air condition, 24 hour power supply, fans and reliable security are available just for you.

facilities.example: Chairs,Dance Floor,Air Conditioner,Changing Room,Banquet Style,Internet,Security Cameras,Lighting,Parking Space,Sound System,Stage,Tables,Projector,White Board,Rest Room,Security

details.example: It gives us great pleasure to introduce, Classique Events Place Pearl Hall. A one and a half acre piece of property, uniquely brick built with the state of the art facility within a well kept vicinity. It is spacious, fully airconditioned and highly insulated with capacity to host up to 500 guests in banquet settings and 1000 guests in theater settings. This makes it convenient for us to host both corporate and retail events in a serene environment. They can conveniently host weddings, corporate functions, parties, banquets, church services and more It further has the capacity to accommodate over 300 cars parked within the premises without obstructing free flow of traffic along the high way.

centers.details: Add a unique touch to your event at Tobol Event Centre. Have a grand event at our exquisite marquee. Be classy on your memorable day with state of the art decoration. It seats 500 persons in a banquet setting and 650 in a theatre setting. Facilities such as tables, chairs, rest rooms, changing room, air condition, 24 hour power supply, fans and reliable security are available just for you.
